entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:09 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 02:01 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Fog patches before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light before morning. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then steady. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to zero in the morning then steady. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
